timeline.bodyText:
Please remove useless comment.
Include Javadoc, todo and fixme only in the comments.
FYI: https://shardingsphere.apache.org/community/en/contribute/code-conduct/
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: Please use static import for Mockito
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: Please use assertThat and InstanceOf to assert
timeline.author: terrymanu
terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: Please do not leave the comment codes
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: Please use assertThat and InstanceOf to assert
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: Please add final if the class is not design for extension
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.message: remove comment, Mockito static import ,use assertThat and InstanceOf to assert, remove useless blank line, add final for class
